channel.title: 718 Source Issue :L
channel.description: Hey, I've recently come back to RSPS after a 4 year break, decided I would host a 718 server. When running my source I'm running into this error: [code] [Launcher] Loading ExtremeKO, please wait... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19 at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:283) at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemsEquipIds.init(ItemsEquipIds.java:13) at com.rs.Initializer.loadFiles(Initializer.java:40) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:42) Press any key to continue . . . [/code] I've got the latest JRE and JDK installed, I've fixed up the java version in the files and so I was just wondering if there was anything else I have missed? I haven't edited anything yet.

item.title: 718 Source Issue :L
item.dc:creator: @BrandonRSPS BrandonRSPS
item.description:
@BrandonRSPS wrote:

Hey, I’ve recently come back to RSPS after a 4 year break, decided I would host a 718 server.
When running my source I’m running into this error:

[Launcher] Loading ExtremeKO, please wait...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19
        at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:283)
        at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemsEquipIds.init(ItemsEquipIds.java:13)
        at com.rs.Initializer.loadFiles(Initializer.java:40)
        at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:42)
Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve got the latest JRE and JDK installed, I’ve fixed up the java version in the files and so I was just wondering if there was anything else I have missed? I haven’t edited anything yet.

Read full topic
